footer.about_p1: EbookSamnorng.com – No. 1 website for construction documents.
footer.about_p2: EbookSamnorng.com is a place to buy, sell, exchange and share design and construction documents.
footer.about_p3: Specializing in providing digital products in the field of construction: books, documents, software, spreadsheets, forms, images, videos...
footer.listing_instr: Instructions for listing products for sale

product.scan_qr: Scan the QR code or click the button above to pay securely via ABA Bank.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.payment_note: Once you have completed the payment, please fill in your details and click 'Confirm Order' below. We will verify and send your e-books immediately.
checkout.other_payments: Other payment methods are available on request. Contact us via Telegram for faster support.
checkout.success_message: Your order has been successfully processed. You now have official access to the professional engineering repository.
checkout.trust_footer: Secure Digital Delivery • Professional Engineering Library • 24/7 Support

payment_instruction.header_subtitle: Follow our professional workflow to access your construction documents quickly.

step1.title: 1. Explore & Select
step1.subtitle: Browse our extensive library
step1.description: Discover the e-books you need for your construction projects. Click on any item to view detailed specifications, pages, and format information.

step2.title: 2. Add to Cart
step2.subtitle: Secure your selection
step2.description: Once you found the right technical document, simply click 'ADD TO SHOPPING CART'. You can continue shopping or proceed directly to your cart.

step3.title: 3. Secure Payment
step3.subtitle: Instant KHQR Transaction
step3.description: Proceed to checkout and scan the provided KHQR code with your banking app (ABA, Wing, etc.). It's fast, secure, and encrypted.

step4.title: 4. Receive Access
step4.subtitle: Get your unlock code
step4.description: After payment, click the 'Submit' button. You'll be redirected to our Telegram chat. Share your receipt and we'll send your unzip password immediately.

payment_instruction.delivery_description: Once your payment is submitted, our automated system or support team will provide the Unzip Password directly in the chat. All files are hosted on high-speed Google Drive for your convenience.

contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Let us know how we can help!
contact_page.form_success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon.
contact_page.faq_q1: How do I download my e-books?
contact_page.faq_a1: After purchase, you can download your e-books directly from your account dashboard. You'll have lifetime access to all your purchases.
contact_page.faq_q2: What payment methods do you accept?
contact_page.faq_a2: We accept bank transfers, credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets. All payments are processed securely.
contact_page.faq_a3: Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all e-book purchases if you're not satisfied with the content.
contact_page.faq_q4: Are the books available on mobile?
contact_page.faq_a4: Our e-books are compatible with all devices including smartphones, tablets, and computers. Simply use your preferred PDF reader.
contact_page.faq_q5: How often do you add new books?
contact_page.faq_a5: We add new titles to our collection weekly. Subscribe to our newsletter to be notified about new releases.
contact_page.ready_subtitle: Browse our collection of engineering e-books and start learning today
